name: Steamer Beef & Broccoli Pasta

ingredients.name: Beef & Broccoli Stir-Fry Seasoning or General Tao Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, combine ground beef and seasoning. Cover; microwave on high for 5 min or until beef is cooked through. Break up meat using Ground Meat Separator.
Add hot water and pasta; stir to mix. Microwave on high, uncovered, for 6 min. Remove from microwave and stir; cook for an additional 3 min 30 sec.
Meanwhile, cut broccoli into bite-sized pieces, as needed.
Add broccoli to steamer. Cover; microwave another 4 min until pasta is cooked.
Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Make it vegan: Swap ground beef with soy ground round.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy green salad and 1 tbsp Balsamic Vinaigrette.

products.name: Beef & Broccoli Stir-Fry Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Slightly sweet, soy-ginger stir-fry sauce. Robust flavors with no chopping necessary.

products.name: General Tao Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: A restaurant favorite at home made with less sugar & sodium. Stir fried, not deep fried.

products.name: Sea Salt (Grinder)
summary: Crisp, clean salt from the sea.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
